snippet: The violinist Frank Peter Zimmermann appeared alongside the New York Philharmonic and its music director, Alan Gilbert, who made his solo debut as a violinist with the orchestra.
lead_paragraph: The violinist Frank Peter Zimmermann appeared alongside the New York Philharmonic and its music director, Alan Gilbert, who made his solo debut as a violinist with the orchestra.

headline.main: Conductor Replaces Baton With Violin, for an Evening
headline.print_headline: Conductor Replaces Baton With Violin, for an Evening
headline.seo: Alan Glibert and Frank Peter Zimmermann on Violin - Review
